Name: multiresolution_gaussian_splatting
Title: Multi-Resolution Gaussian Splatting for Enhanced Real-Time Radiance Field Rendering
Experiment: Modify the rendering pipeline to include a multi-resolution rendering step. Initially render at lower resolutions and progressively increase the resolution during training. Evaluate the impact on training time and output quality.

Name: adaptive_resolution_gaussian_splatting
Title: Adaptive Resolution Adjustment in Gaussian Splatting for Real-Time Radiance Field Rendering
Experiment: Implement an adaptive resolution adjustment mechanism during the training of Gaussian Splatting. The resolution will be adjusted based on real-time performance metrics such as rendering time and loss convergence to balance between rendering speed and quality. Evaluate the impact on training time, output quality, and convergence speed.
